caption: Fortunately, the mission was successful. The Allies only encountered a small number of enemies and occupied the island without causing too many casualties. The group members were very happy, their efforts over the past few months had not been in vain. The Prime Minister also sent a telegram to congratulate the victory of the mission. This mission was called Operation Mincemeat. It saved tens of thousands of lives and it was a crucial step towards Allied victory in Europe. Now, Operation Mincemeat was celebrated as the most spectacular single episode in the history of deception.

global.answer: Both at night and at day time.
